title: President Rajapaksa launches royalty payment scheme for music artists
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) A royalty payment scheme for Sri Lankan music artists was launched by President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Temple Trees on 08 April. This much needed new royalty scheme will benefit lyricists, singers and song composers in Sri Lanka. The state run Sri Lanka Broadcasting Corporation (SLBC)…
